SectionHowItWorks.login: P.S. Not yet Marmott' member ? Join the tribu, click here
SectionHowItWorks.part1Title: 1. Make a global search or browse from a restaurants' space
SectionHowItWorks.part1Text: Using search, filters, and sorting functionalities, find the meals and drinks you're craving for on Marmott'.
SectionHowItWorks.part2Title: 2. Add products from a same restaurant to your cart
SectionHowItWorks.part2Text: Meals and drinks are ready to be delivered or for take away. As soon as you'll be seduced by a restaurant's offer, add the products to your cart, from the same restaurant space.
SectionHowItWorks.part3Title: 3. Order, receive, get delighted by your meal, in your appartement!
SectionHowItWorks.part3Text: Your new meals meet 'n exceed your quality standards? Review the seller and let fellow Marmott' members know about your experience.
SectionHowItWorks.part1Text2: Using search, filters, and sorting, find the meals you're craving from Marmott' sellers.
SectionHowItWorks.part2Text2: Meals are almost ready to be delivered. Make a secure payment right away to make sure you got 'em!
SectionHowItWorks.part3Text2: Your new meals meet 'n exceed your quality standards? Review the seller and let fellow Marmott' members know about your experience.
